#id=1
#text=My friend , Tom , had moved into a new house , and decided to plant a small tree to help make his yard look better .
#id=2
#text=He had been advised by a tree expert , that the best time to plant it was in April or May .
#id=3
#text=So about several weeks after Tom had moved into his new home , he went ahead to plant the tree in mid April .
#id=4
#text=He first got and checked some maps to make sure he did n't mistakenly end up digging into any telephone or gas lines .
#id=5
#text=Once he found a suitable spot to plant his new tree , Tom took a shovel and began preparing the hole to place it in .
#id=6
#text=Next , he prepared the tree for planting by turning carefully upside down to remove it from the pot it came in .
#id=7
#text=He then gently , placed the tree into the hole .
#id=8
#text=Tom also filled the hole with some compost and manure to help the tree grow better .
#id=9
#text=Once this was done , he filled up the hole completely and watered the tree .
#text=Finally , he placed mulch on top and then stopped to admire the beautiful new tree in his yard .
